details.note:
The raw data is a set of bulletins written in English. Each instance of the data consists of a sequence of tokens, a sequence of coarse grain tags/classes, and a sequence of fine grain tags/classes. the tags, i.e., classes, are discussed within the data profile page.

For a history of this data, including its collection and tagging, read
  • The underlying paper; the accompanying data notes.
  • The data card.

The data is accessible via Hugging Face Datasets. Therein, the data set name is DFKI-SLT/fewNerd, and it is courtesy of the German Research Centre for Artificial Intelligence (DFKI) Speech & Language Technology (SLT) Department.
